results.original_title: The Making of an Epic: Mohammad, Messenger of God
results.overview: Documentary on the making of "Mohammad, Messenger of God" (1976).
results.title: The Making of an Epic: Mohammad, Messenger of God

results.overview: Noël is a bachelor who inherits a matrimonial agency.  After contemplating selling it, he chooses to manage it.
results.title: Matrimonial Agency

results.original_title: Largo Winch : Le prix de l’argent
results.overview: Largo Winch, devastated by the kidnapping of his son, realizes that if he finds those responsible for his bankruptcy, maybe he'll see his son again.
results.title: The Price of Money: A Largo Winch Adventure

results.original_title: A Vez de Matar, A Vez de Morrer
results.overview: In the countryside in Brazil, a group of boys hangs out around a gas station with its manager, Élcio. The men drink beer, do lots of macho stuff, play soccer. In the midst of this, there is an exchange of looks that demonstrates repressed desires, the need to sublimate oneself to be in tune with the rest of the world.
results.title: A Time to Kill, A Time to Die

results.overview: Sparks fly when a fashion blogger in Bali meets a gifted shoemaker, leading her to question her commitment to her fiancé.
results.title: A Perfect Fit

results.overview: Cristiana is a 30 year old woman, brought up in a "proper", bourgeois middle-class family. Her time is split between writing for her PhD in Earthquake Engineering, conversations with Alex and Michelle, her two close friends and occasional, eagerly awaited rendezvous' with Dan, a married man with whom she is romantically involved. After her parents move out of the family apartment into a new house, she decides to get a dog. It is something that she wanted ever since she was a child and now that she lives on her own she can finally fulfill this wish.
results.title: Self-Portrait of a Dutiful Daughter

results.overview: An idealistic but struggling actor finds his life unexpectedly complicated when he stops a robbery while wearing the costume of Captain Avenger, a superhero character of a film he is hired to to promote. He decides to dabble at being a superhero only to find that it is more difficult and dangerous than he ever imagined.
results.title: Hero at Large

results.overview: As the dragons have almost disappeared from the kingdom of Bayala, the magic powers of the fairies are weakening. The fairy princesses Sera and Surah are thrilled when they discover they have the key to save the world in their hands: a dragon egg! Now the sisters must reach the dragon mountains and they embark on an adventurous journey into the unknown...
results.title: Bayala: A Magical Adventure

results.original_title: Les dents, pipi et au lit
results.overview: Antoine, a bachelor party-goer, gets new roommates: Jeanne and her two children.
results.title: The Full House

results.overview: Yeon-i who runs a small salon is shaken by Geon-dal’s suggestion to run the salon as an adult service business when customers start to run out. After experiencing the sales method that enables customers to touch female employees while being shampooed and while receiving other services, Yeon-i leaves the salon, but after a few months, she suffers from living difficulties and visits Geon-dal again
results.title: Aunt's Beauty Salon Closing Day

results.original_title: A Muppets Christmas: Letters to Santa
results.overview: When Gonzo forgets to mail three letters to Santa, he convinces Kermit and the gang to help him deliver the notes to the North Pole. Along the way, they discover that Christmas is the time to be with those you care about most, as they dash home to make a friends Christmas wish come true.
results.title: A Muppets Christmas: Letters to Santa

results.original_title: The Chronicle History of King Henry the Fifth with His Battell Fought at Agincourt in France
results.overview: In the midst of the Hundred Years' War, the young King Henry V of England embarks on the conquest of France in 1415.
results.title: Henry V

results.original_title: ドラえもん のび太の日本誕生
results.overview: Nobita and his friends ran away from home, went to Japan of a primitive era by Doraemon's time machine and created their own paradise in there.
results.title: Doraemon: Nobita and the Birth of Japan

results.overview: Using few words and gorgeous imagery, this is a poetic painting of a family, each in their own space on an August afternoon.
results.title: At the First Breath of Wind

results.original_title: As Mil e Uma Noites: Volume 3, O Encantado
results.overview: In which Scheherazade doubts that she will still be able to tell stories to please the King, given that what she has to tell weighs three thousand tonnes. She therefore escapes from the palace and travels the Kingdom in search of pleasure and enchantment. Her father, the Grand-Vizier, arranges to meet her at the Ferris wheel, and Scheherazade resumes her narration: “Auspicious King, in old shanty towns of Lisbon there was a community of bewitched men who, in all rigour and passion, dedicated themselves to teaching birds to sing…”. And seeing the morning break, Scheherazade fell silent.
results.title: Arabian Nights: Volume 3, The Enchanted One

results.original_title: Ahmed, el principe de la Alhambra
results.overview: It is springtime for everyone. However, Prince Ahmed - a fine young boy living in the most wonderful palace existing, does not rejoice over it. On the contrary, he drags along languidly from one lesson by Eben Bonabben, his wise tutor, to another. Today, it cannot be denied that Ahmed is very learned: he knows everything about everything, including talking with birds. No, not everything mind you. There is ONE realm that is not his: the kingdom of the heart. The reason is obvious, although unknown to the prince himself. On the day of his birth, the astrologers of the court predicted that terrible disasters would arise if Ahmed should ever find love.
results.title: Ahmed, The Prince of the Alhambra

results.overview: Aldin, a vagabond water vendor, embarks of a series of fantastical and tragic misadventures through the Middle East in search of love, fortune, and power.
results.title: A Thousand and One Nights

results.overview: Archer champion Lauren Pierce escapes a corrupt juvenile correctional facility with Rebecca, a fierce but alluring inmate. Together they must survive a desperate warden who is bow-hunting his prey to make sure his secret stays buried
results.title: The Archer

results.overview: Bride-to-be Jessie Patterson calls off her third engagement - during the ceremony! She swears off serious relationships, until she meets and is pursued by Aiden MacTiernan. Aiden, on the other hand, has bet his friends he is marriage material, and can find a fiancé in the four weeks leading up to Christmas. When Jessie and Aiden begin to fall for each other, Jessie must decide if she is ready for serious love, and Aiden must decide if his bet is worth risking his relationship with Jessie.
results.title: A Bride for Christmas
